name: Am Universe: Art Death - Phase 2
description:
So the idea is, get ready for this, an interactive sim danmaku game, nuts right?

This was a game used to demonstrate a proof of concept for a series I wanted to work on. Except, uh... nobody cared. So I am just releasing what I have right now, no need to keep stressing myself.

Phase one was the initial release, phase 2 was fixing up bugs and reworking mechanics. Again, nobody cared so I kinda lost steam and there are some glaring issues. Phase three was going to link this game and the sequel, which would be the game this is leading up to.

I dunno if I'm gonna do that, I don't think I can make it as a game dev and think I need to move on.
